Our products

  • PeakSel

    #analytical chemistry

    Gather data from all your Analytical Instruments, build reports, analyze thousands of samples quickly.

  • MolEvent

    #datamining

    Register virtual compounds, know what`s happening to your molecules across teams, projects or whole organization.

  • CrystaLine

    #crystallography

    Grow, harvest and track crystals. Organize, share, mine data.
